title: 🔥 How to get your competitors Keywords and Rank on Amazon KDP for low content books

tactics.name: Competitor Keyword Extraction
tactics.description: Identify top-selling books in your niche by targeting non-sponsored products with high sales and low competition.
steps: Search Amazon for top sellers in your niche (e.g., 'Christmas coloring books').
Avoid sponsored books by checking for 'sponsored' labels.
Extract keywords from product details and ASINs using Helium 10.
caveats: Free plan limits to 2 searches/day for keyword research.
source_quotes: you should be targeting books that are e on nich maybe this ones and on the first page

tactics.name: Competitor Keyword Analysis
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to extract competitors' keywords and filter by search volume and competition
steps: Use free plan to compile keywords
Export data to Excel for manual filtering
Prioritize keywords with high search volume and low competition
source_quotes: they filtered over 4,077 keywords for our competitors

heuristics.name: Review Count Filter
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize books with lower competition.
source_quotes: you should not Target is books that are sponsored

heuristics.name: Review Volume Filter
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize keywords
source_quotes: search volume is important to me

heuristics.name: Review-Driven Keyword Optimization
heuristics.condition: If median_reviews is less than 200, prioritize keywords with higher search volume
source_quotes: struggling we trying to open it okay so it's here

claims.statement: Sponsored books on Amazon have artificially inflated Best Seller Rank.
source_quotes: don't even Target because it's sponsored and the ranking is not accurate

claims.statement: Organic keywords for a book can reach 3,787 with proper analysis
Amazon takes three months to index new books for ranking
source_quotes: Amazon will take three months to index your books

niche_patterns.example: adult coloring books + high price point + low competition
niche_patterns.description: Target niche markets with specific constraints to reduce competition.
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Limits keyword saturation and improves ranking potential.
source_quotes: we look at books that has lowest VSR ranks
